items.title: Far-right ministers Smotrich, Ben-Gvir to sit on team setting powers of Oct. 7 gov't probe committee

NYC Mayor Adams' Israel trip shows how badly he misread the U.S. Jews he claims to champion
items.summary: Adams is seeking allies to combat antisemitism, yet the Israeli leaders he embraces are more concerned with strengthening an Israeli nationalism that alienates the U.S. Jews he wants to protect

items.title: Trump says U.S. will sell F-35 jets to Saudi Arabia in defense sale opposed by Israel
items.summary: Defense officials are concerned that the Israel Air Force will lose its air superiority in the Middle East if the United States sells the stealth jets to Saudi Arabia. The sale could potentially defy Israel's qualitative military edge, as mandated by U.S. policy

items.title: New video shows stunning Aurora Borealis over South Dakota
items.summary: Officials at Nasa say the sun is at the peak of its 11-year cycle, known as "solar maximum", which could lead to more severe geomagnetic storms.

items.title: Israeli man indicted over posting TikTok video threatening attorney general
items.summary: A Haifa resident is charged with saying in the TikTok video that Attorney General Gali Baharav-Miara's days are numbered. 'A new era has begun, you whore – Kahanism.' He's been imprisoned before for saying physicist and activist Shikma Bressler should be murdered

items.title: Likud minister offers Shin Bet funds from equality ministry to fight crime in Arab communities
items.summary: The Justice Ministry warned that Social Equality Minister May Golan's plan could increase crime due to slashes in programs that help people in debt in Arab communities. The education and welfare ministries also believe that the plan is harmful

items.title: Figurine of gander covering woman may show 12,000-year-old myth in Israel
items.summary: By the prehistoric Sea of Galilee, a Natufian in an early village made and fired what may be the world's earliest figurine of a lively scene

items.title: Settlers set fire to Palestinian homes and vehicles in West Bank after IDF evacuates Israeli outpost
items.summary: In Umm al-Butm, settlers set fire to a building and vehicles and assaulted Palestinian women in their homes. In Jab'a, settlers also set fire to three homes, vehicles, and a caravan. 'A disaster, a disaster has happened here, all in front of the soldiers and police,' a resident said

items.title: Witness in major corruption probe of Israel's largest labor union dies by suicide
items.summary: The contractor, who was not a suspect, had overseen work at the home of Histadrut chairman Arnon Bar-David and his wife, central figures in a sweeping corruption probe. Police raided the labor union's headquarters two weeks ago, arresting dozens of suspects

items.title: UN Security Council discussing U.S. proposal to deploy Gaza stabilization force
items.summary: Amendments introduced last week under pressure from Arab and Muslim states, as well as several Security Council members, include a reference to the possibility of establishing a future Palestinian state – after which Netanyahu reiterated Israel's opposition to such a state

items.title: 'The occupation hates partnerships between Palestinians and Israelis, it blows their mind'
items.summary: Once invited to exhibit his art in Tel Aviv and Berlin, Palestinian artist Eid Hathleen now spends his days documenting settler violence and fighting a final demolition order against his house amid the slow erasure of his West Bank village, Umm al-Khair

items.title: Top IDF officers say defense minister's order targeting Egypt border smugglers risks civilian safety
items.summary: Israeli defense officials estimate that between 100 and 300 Israeli smugglers operate along the Egyptian border. The IDF said it has thwarted roughly 130 drone-smuggling attempts and seized about 85 weapons in November, including two machine guns, 16 long-barreled weapons and 66 handguns

items.summary: Sheinbaum, elected last year, is Mexico's first Jewish president. Israel's foreign minister, Gideon Sa'ar, denounced the graffiti: 'Israel strongly condemns the antisemitic and sexist slurs directed at Mexico's President,' he wrote on X

items.title: Israeli government pushes to split attorney general's powers into three separate roles
items.summary: The Attorney General's Office warns that splitting the role, which currently involves being legal adviser to the cabinet and chief prosecutor, could lead elected officials suspected of crimes to be involved in the appointment of the prosecutors in their cases

items.summary: Israeli researchers have pioneered a coral reef restoration project in Fiji, melding ancient pottery techniques with cutting-edge 3D printing technology. This is how they enlisted nine local chiefs – and how living in a village without electricity helped them succeed

items.title: Meny Godard, killed on Oct. 7 and taken hostage, laid to rest in Israel after body returned from Gaza
